/*  Game Announcer
	Description: Announces current and new games. Gives information about slots while not having the browser open.
	
	Started: 05.12.2012
	Last edit: 11.12.2012
*/

#SingleInstance force
DetectHiddenWindows, On
#Persistent
Name = Game Announcer
Version = 1.0
settingspath = %A_WorkingDir%\GA Settings.ini

IfNotExist, %settingspath%
{
	MsgBox,64,%name% - %version%,
(
Hello,
a settings.ini has been created here (%settingspath%).

After pressing ok, please edit the following 3 things:
• CopyNewGN: If set to 1, it will automatically copy the new gamename.
• AntiSpam: Is the number of seconds until the new announcement.
• Gamename: Is the specific name for the game. E.g.:
To filter for <BGN> Island Defense #1 just put Island Defense as gamename
To filter for <BGN> DotA LoD -sdems6d2 #1 just put DotA LoD -sdems6d2
To filter for >BGN> DotA LoD -sds6d2 #1 just put DotA LoD -sds6d2

Please run the %name% after editing the settings again.
)
				
	IniWrite,1.0,%settingspath%,Settings,Version
	IniWrite,5,%settingspath%,Settings,AntiSpam
	IniWrite,Island Defense,%settingspath%,Settings,Gamename
	IniWrite,0,%settingspath%,Settings,CopyNewGN
	
	Run %settingspath%
	ExitApp
}

IniRead()

If (delay = Error)
	delay := 5000
If (copy = Error)
	copy := 0
If (gn = Error)
	gn = Island Defense

	Gui, font, bold
	Gui, add, text, x90 y10 h25 w250,
	Gui, font, normal
	Gui, font, s11
	Gui, add, button, gStart x5 y5 w80 h25, Start
	Gui, add, button, gStop x5 y5 w80 h25, Stop
	GuiControl, hide, Button2
	Gui, add, button, gPause x5 yp+30 w80 h25, Pause
	Gui, show, w250 h65, %name% %version%

Menu, Tray, DeleteAll
Menu Tray, NoStandard
Menu, Tray, add, Info, InfoTray
Menu, Tray, add
Menu, Tray, add, Support, SupportTray
Menu, Tray, add
Menu, Tray, add, Exit, GuiClose
Menu, Tray, Tip, %name%
GoSub, Icons
	IfExist,%A_workingdir%\logo.ico
		Menu, Tray, icon, %A_workingdir%\logo.ico
DllCall("uxtheme\SetWindowThemeAttribute", "ptr", WinExist(), "int", 1, "int64*", 6 | 6<<32, "uint", 8)
Return

icons:
{
picture =
loadHex()

picture := Ltrim picture

	VarSetCapacity( IconData,( nSize:=StrLen(picture)//2) )
	Loop %nSize%
		NumPut( "0x" . SubStr(picture,2*A_Index-1,2), IconData, A_Index-1, "Char" )
	picture := ""       
	hICon := DllCall( "CreateIconFromResourceEx", UInt,&IconData+22
					, UInt,0, Int,1, UInt,196608, Int,32, Int,32, UInt,0 )

	WinGet, PID, PID, A
		ID := WinExist("ahk_pid" PID)
			SendMessage, 0x80, 0, hIcon ,, ahk_id %ID%  ; Small Icon
			SendMessage, 0x80, 1, hIcon ,, ahk_id %ID%  ; Big Icon
}
return

loadHex()
{
	global
	picture = 
(join

)
WriteFile(A_workingdir "\logo.ico",picture)
}
return

WriteFile(file,data)
{
   Handle :=  DllCall("CreateFile","str",file,"Uint",0x40000000
                  ,"Uint",0,"UInt",0,"UInt",4,"Uint",0,"UInt",0)
   Loop
   { 
     if strlen(data) = 0
        break
     StringLeft, Hex, data, 2         
     StringTrimLeft, data, data, 2  
     Hex = 0x%Hex%
     DllCall("WriteFile","UInt", Handle,"UChar *", Hex
     ,"UInt",1,"UInt *",UnusedVariable,"UInt",0) 
    } 
  
   DllCall("CloseHandle", "Uint", Handle)
   return
}

infoTray:
MsgBox,64,%name% - %version%,The game announcer is developed by aRt)Y and filters this site (http://blinkgaming.net/current_games) for the specific gamename you've entered.
Return

supporttray:
msgBox,64,%name% - %version%,Support will be soon available on https://code.google.com/p/pdrmf/.`nYou can also email me at ProjectDRMF@gmail.com
return

start:
{

	global stop := 0
		
	;SetTimer, timer, On 
	GuiControl,,Static1,Starting Internet Explorer
	GuiControl, hide, Button1
	GuiControl, show, Button2
	
	wb := ComObjCreate("InternetExplorer.Application")
	wb.Visible := false
	Enabled := ComObjError(false)
	wb.Navigate("http://blinkgaming.net/current_games")
	

	While wb.readyState != 4 || wb.document.readyState != "complete" || wb.busy 
	   Sleep, 100

	global toggle:=!toggle
	
	;SetTimer, check, On

	Loop,
	{
		If (!toggle)
		{
			break
			GuiControl,,Static1,
			Return
		}
			
		If (stop = 1) {
			Break
			GuiControl,,Static1,
			Return
		}
			
		IfWinNotExist, ahk_class IEFrame
		{
			TrayTip,%name% stopped.,Internet Explorer doesn't exit anymore.,3,1
			GoSub, stop
			return
		}

		If stop != 1
			GuiControl,,Static1,Refreshing page...
		Sleep 1000
		wb.Refresh()
		
		delay1 := delay
		Loop, %delay%
		{
			If (stop = 1)
				break
		
			GuiControl,,Static1,Anti-Spam (%delay1% seconds)
			Sleep 1000
			delay1 -= 1
		}
		
		text := wb.document.documentElement.innerText
		counter := 0

		If stop != 1
			GuiControl,,Static1,Filtering page...
		Sleep 1000
		found := 0
			Loop, parse, text,`n,`n
			{	
				If A_LoopField contains %GN%
				{
					counter++
					found := 1
					If counter = 1
					{
						pureGN := A_LoopField
						StringReplace,pureGN,pureGN,`r,,All
					}
						
					If counter = 2
					{
						infoGN := A_LoopField
						len := StrLen(pureGN)
						len -= 1
											
						StringTrimLeft, slots, infoGN, %len%
						StringTrimLeft, slots, slots, 1
						infoGN := pureGN A_Space slots
					}
				}
				If (counter = 2 && found = 1)
					break
			}
		
			new := 0
			If (found = 0)
			{
				If stop != 1
				{
					SoundPlay, *48
					info := % (pureGN != "") ? "`npureGN" : " n/a"
					TrayTip,Game not found.,New one might be hosted.,3,2
				}
			}
										
			If (oldGN != pureGN && start = 1 && found = 1)
			{
				If stop != 1
				{
					SoundPlay, *64
					TrayTip,New game:,%pureGN%,3,1
					If Copy = 1
						Clipboard := pureGN
					oldGN := pureGN
					new := 1
				}
			}
			
			If ((oldGN = pureGN && new = 0 && found = 1) || start = "")
			{
				If stop != 1
				{
					start := 1
					oldGN := pureGN
					TrayTip,Current game:,%infoGN%,3,1
				}
			}
							
			;GuiControl,,Static1,
	}
}
return

Stop:
{
	global toggle:=!toggle
	;SetTimer, timer, off
	GuiControl, hide, Button2
	GuiControl, show, Button1
	global stop := 1
	wb.quit()
	GuiControl,,Static1,
}
return

Pause:
	Pause, toggle, 1
	GuiControl,, Button3, % (A_IsPaused = 1) ? "Unpause" : "Pause"
return

			msgbox stoped
		}
	}
	Sleep 1000
}
return

GuiClose:
wb.quit()
ExitApp
Return

IniRead() {
global
IniRead,VersionCheck,%settingspath%,Settings,Version
IniRead,Delay,%settingspath%,Settings,AntiSpam
IniRead,GN,%settingspath%,Settings,Gamename
IniRead,Copy,%settingspath%,Settings,CopyNewGN
}
return
